name: Music UI Browser Tests
description: Automate basic audio player interactions (play, pause, seek) and discovery page load

args.script: (async () => { const { chromium } = require('playwright'); const browser = await chromium.launch(); const page = await browser.newPage(); await page.goto('http://localhost:3000'); await page.click('text=Songs'); await page.waitForTimeout(500); console.log('Opened Songs page'); await browser.close(); })();
